short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the layout of the new ESPN fantasy web site that fantasy basketball uses. Removes the inner table scrolling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension that tries to improve the layout of the "My Team" tab in the new ESPN Fantasy Basketball UI. Most of all it fixes the weird scroll inside the stats table on ESPN that makes the team page much harder to use.

You can find the contents on Github at: https://github.com/alxHenry/espn-fantasy-new-css-improvement

The icon was created by eucalyp at https://www.flaticon.com/authors/eucalyp
